name: Swany ViralOff Mask - Men's
description: Light face coverings to help protect you and those around you. Treated with an antiviral ViralOff®, these reusable face masks offer an extra layer of protection.Polygiene® ViralOff produces a 99% reduction of a virus’s ability to stay on cloth after 2 hours (according to a standard ISO18184:2019 test, active ingredients are titanium dioxide and silver chloride).3D fit follows the contours of your face.Stretch polyester blend is highly breathable, wicks moisture and dries quickly.Hand wash and air dry.One size fits all design.
